meanings.definition: Not newsworthy; lacking importance or interest.
meanings.sent1: The story about my cat sleeping all day was unnewsworthy.
meanings.sent2: The unnewsworthy event went unnoticed by the media.
meanings.sent3: The unnewsworthy gossip about my neighbor's plants made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her unnewsworthy outfit screamed for attention in the crowded room.
meanings.sent5: The unnewsworthy details of the meeting faded from memory quickly.

meanings.definition: Not deserving of being reported as news.
meanings.sent1: The unnewsworthy incident was quickly forgotten by everyone.
meanings.sent2: The journalist decided the story was unnewsworthy and moved on.
meanings.sent3: The unnewsworthy rumor about aliens visiting the town amused the locals.
meanings.sent4: Her unnewsworthy behavior at the party raised eyebrows among the guests.
meanings.sent5: The unnewsworthy nature of the event made it easy to overlook.
